messages: 8c873dd996b190844ebfe7cfed2af7b7 (02:59): simonko24: Not with the amount of information you've so far provided about your problem, no.
6dd0ddcb7518fb6ae73cac462c8eb926 (03:00): i ve done <td with="... it seems to be just ignored i cant understand
8c873dd996b190844ebfe7cfed2af7b7 (03:00): simonko24: Think of width for table data cells as a suggestion, and HTML attributes as the wrong tool for presentation.
6dd0ddcb7518fb6ae73cac462c8eb926 (03:01): but i m not going to use css
8c873dd996b190844ebfe7cfed2af7b7 (03:01): simonko24: Why not? Its the correct tool for presentation.
6dd0ddcb7518fb6ae73cac462c8eb926 (03:01): because i m not a web designer
6dd0ddcb7518fb6ae73cac462c8eb926 (03:02): i program in php and jsp
8c873dd996b190844ebfe7cfed2af7b7 (03:02): I'm not a race car driver. I still use petrol instead of wiskey to fuel my car.
6dd0ddcb7518fb6ae73cac462c8eb926 (03:02): i just need to fix this with this table
8c873dd996b190844ebfe7cfed2af7b7 (03:03): simonko24: If you're insistent on not using CSS, then too bad, what you want is impossible.
8c873dd996b190844ebfe7cfed2af7b7 (03:03): simonko24: Well, you're quite welcome to delude youself if you like.
6dd0ddcb7518fb6ae73cac462c8eb926 (03:04): when css was not even invented
8c873dd996b190844ebfe7cfed2af7b7 (03:04): The default table layout model is "If it won't fit, make it bigger, even if the author says otherwise". And it won't fit in 50px.
8c873dd996b190844ebfe7cfed2af7b7 (03:04): HTML is not a layout language!
2191be80fdfc8cc56f4aeff41b1d412e (03:34): It's really as simple as that to assume you separate style from content.
2191be80fdfc8cc56f4aeff41b1d412e (03:37): I'm not sure why people can't make that connection.
3c26b6648764f1ab4360aa71da5d760b (03:48): He'll be back when he puts some OTHER content in there, or loads some OTHER browser and notices it breaks
